ChangeStatus(evt)¶

Actualize the Status Bar

Parameters

evt (wx.Event https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.Event.html) – Event binded to trigger the function

ComPortThread()¶

Thread that handles the incoming traffic. Does the basic input transformation (newlines) and call an OnSerialRead

OnChangeFocus(event)¶

Allow to navigate in the differents region of the Frame after an event

Parameters

evt (wx.Event https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.Event.html) – Event binded to trigger the function

OnKey(event)¶

Key event handler. If the key is in the ASCII range, write it to the serial port. Newline handling is also done here.

OnSerialRead(data)¶

Handle input from the serial port.

Set the Focus on the Status Bar

Parameters

OnZoomOut(evt)¶

the return of the command sent

OnInit()¶

Special constructor (do not modify) which affect the Mainwindow to the App

Returns

a boolean to stop or continue the
